answers.answer: What kind of medicines are you taking?  Some medicines make me have those same feelings.  It could also be an allergic reaction to something, I hope you find out whats going on.  Keep us posted.  Good luck.

I have been Going through the same exact thing it started in my feet as well and the next day up my legs and slowly creeping up to my bra line.. Ive been to the hospital three times and still no answers! Im going to see a neorologist to see if they find anything so ill keep posting until i get sum answers! Please do the same if u find out wats wrong... Thank you!

question: For 2 weeks I have been experiencing constant numbness which started in my feet and the next day continued into my legs, stomach, back, lower arms and hands. I have been to 7 doctors now, they tell me it's anxiety or they simply don't know what to say and tell me it's a medical mystery. My blood tests are negative and I have been tested for everything from diabetes to HIV. Vitamin levels are good too. This whole thing is making me crazy. My extremities are so tired after a day's work and it's effecting my sleep, and mental state too. I have been given sleep aid, and a very small dose of an anti depressant, nothing helps with the tingling though. I'm fatigued trying to figure this out, and am searching for any and all medical advice I can find. Thank you for taking the time to read this and any advice you can offer :)
title: Experiencing Numbness and Tingling in feet, legs, arms, hands, stomach and back, what could this be?
